1. Learned counsel for the parties seek further time to ascertain the lead matters in the context of which some of the issues that have canvassed can be addressed.

2. Mr. Kapoor, learned Counsel appearing for some of the petitioners shall coordinate with Mr. Satyakam (as we are informed that Mr. Gautam Narayan is no longer appearing for the Government of Signature Not Verified Digitally Signed By:HARMINDER KAUR Signing Date:20.03.2023 13:20:25 LPA 130/2017 & connected matters Page 6 of 7 NCT of Delhi) in ascertaining the said lead matters as well as frame the specific issues (which are representative of the issues in this batch of petitions) in those matters.

3. List on 03.05.2023.

\ VIBHU BAKHRU, J AMIT MAHAJAN, J MARCH 16, 2023 "SS"
